comments:
With a freshly installed RC1 i get the error below when trying to run any type of run configuration. Normal java application execution should work with a clean install of the platform. 

This error also came up on M6 for me. M5 is working fine though.

Even if you can't recreate the error, please take a look at the code referred to in the error trace since it seems that it shouldn't occur, since it's an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.

An internal error occurred during: "Launching".
